original_title: Jayawardenepura University gets new Vice Chancellor
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); , President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed Senior Professor Pathmalal M. Manage as the Vice Chancellor of the Sri Jayawardenepura University for a three-year term.
Prior to this appointment, Prof. Manage was serving as the Dean of the Faculty of Graduate Studies.
The appointment which came into immediate effect, was confirmed by the President's Media Division.
